@graph.name: Vegetable Potato Fritters - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: These potato fritters with red lentils are super easy to make and so delicious! They're best with spicy sriracha mayonnaise. They're vegan, kid-friendly, and packed with proteins!

@graph.headline: Vegetable Potato Fritters
@graph.keywords: are potato fritters vegan,how do you make potato fritters,how do you make potato fritters without eggs,how to make potato fritters,potato fritters,potato fritters without egg,vegan potato fritters,what to have with potato fritters

@graph.name: Vegetable Potato Fritters
@graph.description: These potato fritters with red lentils are super easy to make and so delicious! They're best with spicy sriracha mayonnaise. Of course 100 % vegan!

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the red lentils according to the instructions on the package. Peel and grate the potatoes and the carrot.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the red lentils according to the instructions on the package. Peel and grate the potatoes and the carrot.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine them with the cooked red lentils, the garlic, the onion, the flour, and the spices and stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine them with the cooked red lentils, the garlic, the onion, the flour, and the spices and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a large pan, and add about 1 1/2 heaped tablespoons for each fritter. Cook them on medium heat in a son-sticky pan for three to four minutes on each side. Alternatively, you can also make them in the oven for an oil-free version (about 20 minutes, flipping halfway).
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil in a large pan, and add about 1 1/2 heaped tablespoons for each fritter. Cook them on medium heat in a son-sticky pan for three to four minutes on each side. Alternatively, you can also make them in the oven for an oil-free version (about 20 minutes, flipping halfway).

recipeInstructions.text: For the vegan sriracha mayonnaise, combine all ingredients and stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: For the vegan sriracha mayonnaise, combine all ingredients and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the fritters with a green salad and the sriracha mayonnaise. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve the fritters with a green salad and the sriracha mayonnaise. Enjoy!
